programme.title: Forged In Fire (S10)
programme.desc: Four smiths spring into action when they must forge signature blades from the metal found in various household items. Two smiths head to their home forges to recreate the Napoleon Presentation Saber.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: Genius is widely considered to be the ability to change the world in an incredible way: inventing new technology, deciphering the mysteries of the universe, or creating transcendent art.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: More than 10,000 crop circle formations have been documented in over 50 countries, and many display properties that defy conventional explanations. Are they of otherworldly origin?

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There (S2)
programme.desc: Could the remains of a small, human-like creature be the corpse of an alien visitor? Are loud booms around New Jersey actually coming from giants or gods?

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There (S2)
programme.desc: Could mysterious lights under the surface of the deepest lake on Earth be connected to extraterrestrial life? Has Bigfoot's call and chatter finally been captured on tape?

programme.title: THE PROMISED NEVERLAND Season 2
programme.desc: Following their escape from the House, Emma and the others are headed for the destination marked by the pen Norman left behind. However, a huge wild demon stops them in their tracks.

programme.title: THE PROMISED NEVERLAND Season 2
programme.desc: Those who saved Emma and the others are demons named “Mujika” and “Sonju”. Sonju shares about the “past”, and a “promise” that was made between demons and humans.

programme.title: The Duke of Death and His Maid Season 3

programme.desc: The group arrives at Atami. Trying to give Shozo and Ine alone time, Mino and Shota end up sharing a room. The next day, Shozo turns old again, but enjoys his time at the beach with Ine.

programme.title: THE iDOLM@STER SHINYCOLORS

programme.title: Prima Doll
programme.desc: Peace returns to the imperial capital after the war. “Kuronekotei” is a café located in the fifth ward, and dolls are employed there. On a night when the cherry blossoms flutter, Haizakura awakens. She meets many new friends, as well as a little one named Chiyo. She hums her first melody along with her newfound purpose.

programme.title: Prima Doll
programme.desc: The café is out of eggs and can't make any food! Troops dispatched are returning, and the world seems to be lacking resources. Haizakura joins a quiet doll, Gekka, to purchase supplies. Overwhelmed by the bustle of the imperial capital, the two try their best to acquire eggs. It seems that Gekka feels especially sentimental toward eggs, relating to her memories of her military service…?

programme.title: Prima Doll
programme.desc: Peace returns to the imperial capital after the war. “Kuronekotei” is a café located in the fifth ward, and dolls are employed there. On a night when the cherry blossoms flutter, Haizakura awakens. She meets many new friends, as well as a little one named Chiyo. She hums her first melody along with her newfound purpose.

programme.title: Prima Doll
programme.desc: The café is out of eggs and can't make any food! Troops dispatched are returning, and the world seems to be lacking resources. Haizakura joins a quiet doll, Gekka, to purchase supplies. Overwhelmed by the bustle of the imperial capital, the two try their best to acquire eggs. It seems that Gekka feels especially sentimental toward eggs, relating to her memories of her military service…?

programme.title: THE PROMISED NEVERLAND Season 2
programme.desc: Following their escape from the House, Emma and the others are headed for the destination marked by the pen Norman left behind. However, a huge wild demon stops them in their tracks.

programme.title: THE PROMISED NEVERLAND Season 2
programme.desc: Those who saved Emma and the others are demons named “Mujika” and “Sonju”. Sonju shares about the “past”, and a “promise” that was made between demons and humans.

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki
programme.desc: Fumiya Tomozaki is a bottom-tier character.He has another name — “nanashi”. It's his handle name as the glorious top “Atafami” player in Japan. When it comes to Atafami, he's unbeatable.

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki
programme.desc: Tomozaki is given an order by NONAME, to strike a conversation with three girls in school. He's learning the way to conquer the game of life through Aoi, aka the school's perfect heroine.

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki
programme.desc: Tomozaki is out shopping for clothes with Aoi. While he's impressed with Aoi's strategies, he's thrown off balance by the missions. The path to becoming a normie is a long and arduous one.

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki
programme.desc: Tomozaki ends up coaching Yuzu on Attack Fams. While Yuzu is put-off by Tomozaki's overwhelming passion, she is also impressed by how he doesn't worry about what others think.

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki
programme.desc: Nakamura's friend, Takahiro Mizusawa invites Tomozaki for a meal with Aoi and Yuzu, but it turns out to be a present-hunting session for Nakamura. Meanwhile, Aoi issues a new mission…

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki
programme.desc: The student council elections begins. While everyone is sure that Aoi would win, Mimimi joins as a candidate. Aoi assigns Tomozaki as Mimimi's referee while Mizusawa becomes Aoi's referee…

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki
programme.desc: After putting in all they can, voting day is here, kicking off with the candidate speeches. Against Aoi, an extremely powerful candidate, Tomozaki has a clever plan in place…

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki
programme.desc: Days of studying late into the night and attending morning practice continue for Mimimi since the elections. While Tama and Tomozaki worry about her, Tomozaki decides to talk to Mimimi…

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki
programme.desc: Days of studying late into the night and attending morning practice continue for Mimimi since the elections. While Tama and Tomozaki worry about her, Tomozaki decides to talk to Mimimi…

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki
programme.desc: It's the summer vacation! Aoi sets a new summer goal for Tomozaki, and in order for him to achieve his goal, they go on a practice date...

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki
programme.desc: Tomozaki and the normie gang have a stayover as they plot to get Izumi and Nakamura going steady. Tomozaki's assignment is to "poke" Nakamura three times during conversations.

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki
programme.desc: Despite plans to bring Yuzu and Nakamura together, progress is slow. Aoi and Tomozaki get together to recap on the stayover but unexpectedly learn something new about Mizusawa…

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki
programme.desc: Aoi and Tomozaki part ways after he objected her way of conquering life. While Tomozaki goes back to his old self, Fuka contacts him and they end up going for a date…

programme.title: ARIFURETA: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
programme.desc: The fateful encounter between Hajime and the vampire, Yue. Knowing that the path back to the surface may lie in the deepest part of the labyrinth, Hajime and Yue decide to venture deeper.

programme.title: ARIFURETA: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
programme.desc: After defeating the monsters, Hajime and Yue reached the 100th floor of the Great Orcus Labyrinth. What awaits them is a six-headed monster with crimson-red eyes and razor fangs—Hydra.

programme.title: ARIFURETA: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
programme.desc: After defeating Hydra, Hajime wakes up at "The Maverick's Lair". With Yue, they start searching for a way to the surface. Meanwhile, Kaori and party returns to the Labyrinth's 65th floor…

programme.title: ARIFURETA: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
programme.desc: Hajime and Yue comes across Shea, daughter of the chief in the Haulia Clan of rabbitmen who begs them to save her family.

programme.title: Skip and Loafer

programme.title: Kemono Michi: Rise Up
programme.desc: Genzo's party is poorer than ever after the addition of a few troublesome freeloaders. To break out of their current situation, Shigure proposes a Griffin extermination quest.

programme.title: Bungo Stray Dogs Season 5
programme.desc: Aya witnessed Jono's defeat and escapes from Fukuchi. The Agency succeeds in keeping the European guards away from the airport, but Fyodor's plan is still one step ahead of Ranpo's...

programme.title: Bungo Stray Dogs Season 5
programme.desc: Fyodor and Dazai accept Nikolai's challenge to escape the prison. Meanwhile, Fukuchi realizes that Bram has been taken away and orders the vampires to locate the culprit.

programme.title: Lycoris Recoil
programme.desc: Walnut, the country's top hacker, is being targeted by an armed group and he turns to LycoReco for help.

programme.title: Lycoris Recoil
programme.desc: Chisato and Takina return to their HQ for their physical exam and fitness tests. There, they are confronted by Fuki, Takina's former partner.

programme.title: The Many Sides of Voice Actor Radio
programme.desc: To promote Heart Tart, Chika and Yumiko appear on Mekuru's radio show, where Yumiko is impressed by Mekuru's skills, despite her harsh remarks. However, something about Mekuru seems off…

programme.title: The Many Sides of Voice Actor Radio
programme.desc: Yuhi and Yasumi host a radio programme as a close-knit voice actor and classmate duo. But the truth is, they're complete opposites who hate each other! What awaits in their difficult path?

programme.title: The Misfit of Demon King Academy Ⅱ: History's Strongest Demon King Reincarnates and Goes to School with His Descendants
programme.desc: The Hero Academy battles the dragons without Anos' help. Meanwhile, Lay and Misa are being captured by Licius…. At the Underground World, Anos learns that Ahide is controlling the Dragonmen.

programme.title: The Misfit of Demon King Academy Ⅱ: History's Strongest Demon King Reincarnates and Goes to School with His Descendants
programme.desc: Anos and Ahide clash. Ahide possesses Arcana and drops the trial of the Sword of the Omnipotent upon Anos. Ahide can be killed with the sword, but the wielder's source will be destroyed…

programme.title: My New Boss Is Goofy
programme.desc: Momose and Shirosaki go to an amusement park for on-site research. On their way back, a power outage causes the train to come to a stop. Momose decides to tell Shirosaki about his past.

programme.title: My New Boss Is Goofy
programme.desc: Momose and Shirosaki find an abandoned kitten. The kitten is frightened at first but eventually warms up to them. They decide to take it in, and Shirosaki comes up with an idea for his name.

programme.title: Kemono Michi: Rise Up
programme.desc: Genzo finally buys a house, but all his funds are almost depleted due to the large amounts of feed required for his magical beasts. One day, Genzo picks up a half-dragon girl...

programme.title: Kemono Michi: Rise Up

programme.title: Bungo Stray Dogs Season 5
programme.desc: Aya witnessed Jono's defeat and escapes from Fukuchi. The Agency succeeds in keeping the European guards away from the airport, but Fyodor's plan is still one step ahead of Ranpo's...

programme.title: Bungo Stray Dogs Season 5
programme.desc: Fyodor and Dazai accept Nikolai's challenge to escape the prison. Meanwhile, Fukuchi realizes that Bram has been taken away and orders the vampires to locate the culprit.

programme.title: Our Last Crusade or the Rise of a New World
programme.desc: Iska is now one step closer his reinstatement as a Saint Disciple. However, he must first capture the Ice Calamity Witch. Meanwhile, Alice learns of Iska's deed of freeing an astral mage.

programme.title: Our Last Crusade or the Rise of a New World
programme.desc: The N07 unit is out on a recreation trip to the casino, and Mismis seems to have something on her mind… Meanwhile, both Iska and Alice cannot stop thinking about each other.

programme.title: The Duke of Death and His Maid Season 3
programme.desc: Dulles attends a ball in a dress, but runs away in embarassment. Walter searches for her. Bocchan decides to meet the past Tsade in a week's time, and visits Gerbera to convey his feelings.

programme.title: The Duke of Death and His Maid Season 3
programme.desc: The team traveling to the past to meet Tsade gather at the manor, where Sein and Walter learn about Tsade's ability and its meaning. Meanwhile, a girls' night is happening at Alice's room.

programme.title: Grandpa and Grandma Turn Young Again
programme.desc: Shozo and Ine invite Shota and Mino on their honeymoon. At Tokyo, they visit the family of Akemi, their oldest daughter. While garnering attention, the couple fully enjoy their honeymoon.

programme.title: Grandpa and Grandma Turn Young Again
programme.desc: The group arrives at Atami. Trying to give Shozo and Ine alone time, Mino and Shota end up sharing a room. The next day, Shozo turns old again, but enjoys his time at the beach with Ine.

programme.title: Fire Force Season 2
programme.desc: Company 8's junior crewmen take in a day of shopping, but their excursion is interrupted by a giant Infernal. The 8th prepares for the annual Special Fire Force beefcake calendar shoot.

programme.title: Fire Force Season 2
programme.desc: Shinra is approved to have a meeting with Company 4 Captain Hague, who may be able to provide information on the Evangelist and Adolla Bursts. However, once the meeting starts…

programme.title: An Archdemon's Dilemma: How to Love Your Elf Bride
programme.desc: After failing her infiltration, Foll freeloads in Zagan's castle. Zagan brings her to Marchosias's castle, where they learn something new about the Archdemon seals and Twelve Holy Swords…

programme.title: An Archdemon's Dilemma: How to Love Your Elf Bride
programme.desc: The slow-moving but heart-fluttering romcom between Zagan, a socially inept and foul-mouthed sorcerer, and Nephy, a beautiful white-haired elf girl from an underground auction, begins!

programme.title: Didn't I Say to Make My Abilities Average in the Next Life?!
programme.desc: Mile is defeated by the most powerful being in the world – the Ancient Dragon. What will become of the fate of the Reina and party as they put their faith in Mile?

programme.title: CESTVS -The Roman Fighter-
programme.desc: Cestvs squares off with Rocco in the final screening for slave fighters. He meets Lucius Nero, fifth emperor of Rome. He is introduced to pankration, the ultimate fighting style.

programme.title: Sacrificial Princess and the King of Beasts
programme.desc: Leonhart is unable to accompany Sariphi on her next task as queen's representative. While putting together a personal guard for Sariphi, one demonfolk steps up and volunteers himself.

programme.title: An Archdemon's Dilemma: How to Love Your Elf Bride
programme.desc: After failing her infiltration, Foll freeloads in Zagan's castle. Zagan brings her to Marchosias's castle, where they learn something new about the Archdemon seals and Twelve Holy Swords…

programme.title: An Archdemon's Dilemma: How to Love Your Elf Bride
programme.desc: The slow-moving but heart-fluttering romcom between Zagan, a socially inept and foul-mouthed sorcerer, and Nephy, a beautiful white-haired elf girl from an underground auction, begins!

programme.title: ARIFURETA: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
programme.desc: Shea, Hajime and Yue head towards the Reisen Gorge, where a rumoured labyrinth lies within. They begin their exploration, but after overcoming the obstacles, something enormous awaits…

programme.title: ARIFURETA: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
programme.desc: Hajime arrives at Fuhren, where he receives a search request from the Adventurer Guild. Stopping by the lakeside town of Ur, he unexpectedly reunites with his classmates…

programme.title: ARIFURETA: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
programme.desc: In order to search for the missing adventure, Hajime's party, his classmates and Aiko Sensei head towards the northern mountain range. One night, a giant black dragon appears…

programme.title: ARIFURETA: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
programme.desc: Hajime learns that monsters are heading to the Town of Ur. While preparing to fight off the horde, Hajime introduces Aiko as the Goddess of Fertility, raising the citizens' morale…

programme.title: THE PROMISED NEVERLAND Season 2
programme.desc: With Mujika and Sonju's guidance, Emma and the children learn the ways of survival. To reach “B06-32”, they trek through a wasteland but find nothing upon reaching there.

programme.title: THE PROMISED NEVERLAND Season 2
programme.desc: The telephone suddenly rings. It's a pre-recorded call from William Minerva. Through the recording, the children learn about the truth. Meanwhile, Isabella is offered a chance at freedom.

programme.title: The Many Sides of Voice Actor Radio
programme.desc: Yuhi and Yasumi host a radio programme as a close-knit voice actor and classmate duo. But the truth is, they're complete opposites who hate each other! What awaits in their difficult path?

programme.title: The Duke of Death and His Maid Season 3
programme.desc: The team traveling to the past to meet Tsade gather at the manor, where Sein and Walter learn about Tsade's ability and its meaning. Meanwhile, a girls' night is happening at Alice's room.

programme.title: The Duke of Death and His Maid Season 3
programme.desc: Bocchan finally meets the witch who cursed him—Tsade. Alice's mother, Sharon, awakens from her eternal slumber. The story between Bocchan and Alice finally reaches a conclusion...!

programme.title: Grandpa and Grandma Turn Young Again
programme.desc: The group arrives at Atami. Trying to give Shozo and Ine alone time, Mino and Shota end up sharing a room. The next day, Shozo turns old again, but enjoys his time at the beach with Ine.

programme.title: Grandpa and Grandma Turn Young Again
programme.desc: Shozo and Ine, an old loving couple, return to their youth after eating a mysterious apple! While spending their days being close like always, the lovebirds are more energetic than before...!

programme.title: The Misfit of Demon King Academy Ⅱ: History's Strongest Demon King Reincarnates and Goes to School with His Descendants
programme.desc: Anos and Ahide clash. Ahide possesses Arcana and drops the trial of the Sword of the Omnipotent upon Anos. Ahide can be killed with the sword, but the wielder's source will be destroyed…

programme.title: Celebrity Race Across the World (S1)
programme.desc: The race intensifies as the four pairs must leave Pinhão in Portugal's Douro Valley and navigate 2,000km through Spain and France to the second checkpoint in Bonifacio on the island of Corsica.

programme.title: Big Little Journeys (S1)
programme.desc: In Canada, a tiny turtle ventures through a forest of giants in search of the wetland, and in South Africa, a bushbaby is drawn towards a world of light in his quest to find a home.

programme.title: Life Below Zero (S11)
programme.desc: Alaskans are in the home stretch of preparing for the upcoming winter.

programme.title: Tribal Bootcamp (S2)
programme.desc: Joel Dommett and Nish Kumar go up against the rock lifters of Tahiti in a strongman competition on the remote island of Rurutu, where events include a fruit race and a dance off.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters (S4)
programme.desc: Cyril is in the dangerous jungle of Gabon, West Africa, on a mission to catch a fanged predatory fish with a deadly bite and a brutally strong pull.

programme.title: Food Factory (S5)
programme.desc: There's a waterfall of chocolate at a California candy factory; meet the saucy squad behind mountains of cannelloni; find out what it takes to make rice noodles by the truckload; and a hardworking team takes the hassle out of preparing butternut squash.

programme.title: Food Factory (S5)
programme.desc: From tree to bottle, follow the amazing story of maple syrup; there's a 'tower of power' behind a delectable Almond Roca butter toffee popcorn; a British Columbia candy company is giving Turkish Delight a thoroughly modern twist; and find out the secret behind apples that taste like grapes.

programme.title: Blue Planet II (S2)
programme.desc: From tropical coral reefs to chilly Norwegian fjords, this episode reveals new worlds and extraordinary never-before-seen animal behaviours.

programme.title: Alexander Armstrong in Sri Lanka (S1)
programme.desc: The presenter takes a train ride into tea country to find out about Ceylon tea. Xander also meets a master Kandyan dancer to learn about Kandy city's annual procession.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn (S1)
programme.desc: An old and deserted dry dock is transformed into an amazing subterranean museum, after the engineers drain the entire ground and build a new concrete base.

programme.desc: Julianne Hough joins Bear on a trek in Africa, where they encounter a pack of elephants blocking their path. Other challenges include dealing with big cats and a snake.

programme.title: Food Factory (S5)

programme.title: Food Factory (S5)
programme.desc: See the chocolate factory behind exotic truffles; eco-friendly coffee pods combine guilt-free caffeine with all the convenience; 250,000 gyoza dumplings roll off the assembly line every day; and meet the inventor of Moon Cheese.

programme.title: The Mating Game (S1)
programme.desc: All life is driven by the need to breed. Yet for a few, the odds of success are overwhelmingly against them, so these have adopted the most extraordinary mating strategies of all.

programme.title: Martin Clunes: Islands of the Pacific (S1)
programme.desc: Martin explores the legendary Galapagos, getting up close to sealions, iguanas, tortoises, penguins, finches and baby sharks. He joins conservation expeditions, sees evolution in action, visits a nun, an organic farm and the site of a murder mystery.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle (S10)
programme.desc: Ben stays with Naveen and Anke who have made their home in the Sri Lanka's highlands. He uncovers why they swapped one of the biggest cities in the world for a simple off-grid existence miles from civilisation.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (S3)
programme.desc: After a breath-taking repel from a helicopter, Bear and Hollywood actor Vanessa Hudgens evade a boulder avalanche, summit a massive dormant volcano and come face-to-face with a rattlesnake.

programme.desc: Martin explores the legendary Galapagos, getting up close to sealions, iguanas, tortoises, penguins, finches and baby sharks. He joins conservation expeditions, sees evolution in action, visits a nun, an organic farm and the site of a murder mystery.

programme.desc: Ben stays with Naveen and Anke who have made their home in the Sri Lanka's highlands. He uncovers why they swapped one of the biggest cities in the world for a simple off-grid existence miles from civilisation.

programme.title: Food Factory (S5)
programme.desc: It takes 80,000 apples to produce a single batch of fruit leather; discover the secret to making squeaky cheese curds; Hello Dolly bars are getting a vegan encore; and there's a fun-loving pit crew behind every tub of a Canadian guacamole.

programme.title: Food Factory (S5)
programme.desc: See the chocolate factory behind exotic truffles; eco-friendly coffee pods combine guilt-free caffeine with all the convenience; 250,000 gyoza dumplings roll off the assembly line every day; and meet the inventor of Moon Cheese.

programme.title: Clean It, Fix It S3 - EP 6
programme.desc: Master builder and household favourite Tommy Walsh is joined by expert pro cleaner Maxine Dwyer and creative carpenter Asher Edwards, as they meet people across the UK who are struggling with household chaos, grime and clutter. Much more than a makeover show, our dynamic professionals provide real-life, practical solutions, invaluable tips and insider tricks to give viewers brilliant take-away ideas for bettering their own living spaces.

programme.title: Slugterra S3 - EP 6
programme.desc: Slugterra is an epic sci-fi comedy adventure set deep underground, where the ammo's alive and only the quick survive! In this luminous, high-tech, underground world every cavern holds a new adventure, new battle and weird little slugs to be discovered!

programme.title: Johnny Test S5 - EP 21
programme.desc: The adventures of average suburban boy Johnny Test, who wittingly plays test subject for his genius twin sisters' various experiments, reluctantly fighting evil villains in the process.

programme.title: Art Factory S2 - EP 7
programme.desc: Art Factory S2 - EP 7

programme.title: Eddy, The Clever Fox S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: Eddy teaches children things like patterns, math, and more!

programme.title: Eddy, The Clever Fox S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: Eddy teaches children things like patterns, math, and more!

programme.title: The Rainbow Bus - EP 7
programme.desc: Mister D takes them to a Stamp Printing Workshop where the will learn more about stamp printing. Next, they head outdoors for an Outdoors Arts Workshop. Finally, they visit a T-Shirt Printing workshop!

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs & Stories - EP 77
programme.desc: Enjoy the best of Pinkfong's most loved songs and stories with all your favourite characters!

programme.title: Sesame Street S51 - EP 17
programme.desc: This season is all about playful problem solving, with the recurring use of the mantra "I wonder, what if, let's try!".

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S26 - EP 29
programme.desc: Thomas and his loc-amigos will embrace unexpected surprises and discover more about each other as they get into new shenanigans on the Island of Sodor. Whiff, Ashima, Toby, Terence, Salty and all new characters will join the fun.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S7 - EP 5
programme.desc: The old theatre is about to be torn down and Cherry is distraught. She tries to put up a show to remind everyone of the magic of the theatre, but will she get it together in time? Monster Cactus is lonely and wants a pet, just like all the other people in Ollipolis. Unfortunately, his spines are too sharp and scare off many potential pets. To make matters worse, he's already decided on the pet that he wants: the Shifty Squares' balloon dog.

programme.title: Vegesaurs S2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Ginger the Tricarrotops explores the world of the crunchiest era, going on adventures throughout the colourful Vegesaur Valley.

programme.title: Vegesaurs S2 - EP 11
programme.desc: Ginger the Tricarrotops explores the world of the crunchiest era, going on adventures throughout the colourful Vegesaur Valley.

programme.title: Art Factory S2 - EP 7
programme.desc: Art Factory S2 - EP 7

programme.title: Gigantosaurus S3 - EP 29
programme.desc: Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu are four young dinosaurs growing up in the Cretaceous period. Life is always an adventure: new volcanoes are popping up all the time, long-necked brachiosauruses and enormous triceratopses roam free, meteor showers light up the night sky and... the fierce Gigantosaurus reigns over it all!

programme.title: Slugterra S3 - EP 6
programme.desc: Slugterra is an epic sci-fi comedy adventure set deep underground, where the ammo's alive and only the quick survive! In this luminous, high-tech, underground world every cavern holds a new adventure, new battle and weird little slugs to be discovered!

programme.title: Johnny Test S5 - EP 21
programme.desc: The adventures of average suburban boy Johnny Test, who wittingly plays test subject for his genius twin sisters' various experiments, reluctantly fighting evil villains in the process.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters - EP 19
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! follows the adventures of high school student Yugi, who has a magical secret that comes to life when he plays his favorite card game.

programme.title: Power Rangers Dino Fury S28 - EP 4
programme.desc: With the prehistoric force of the dinosaurs, a new crew of Power Rangers must deal with a menacing army of alien creatures attacking Earth.

programme.title: DENVER The Last Dinosaur - EP 3
programme.desc: Where most kids dream of having a dog, a cat, or even a hamster, Cliff has a dinosaur - Denver! Within adventures revolving around Cliff, Denver and a comedic crew of human friends, there's an inevitable monkey wrench that is always in play - Denver is a dino in a china shop! Moreover, being one-of- a-kind puts Denver on everyone's radar.

programme.title: Why Not? - EP 6
programme.desc: Horrified by Knot's sudden decision to cook nothing but vegetarian meals, burger-loving Dr Why frantically attempts to figure out how to make a bland salad more tasty. Through experimenting with taste, texture and calories, he begins to formulate the ultimate recipe that will transform tasteless vegetables into a mouthwatering meat patty.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S40 - EP 7766
programme.desc: All new season of Wheel of Fortune.

programme.title: Sunny Side Up - EP 394
programme.desc: Nooraini brings a surprise guest to her Mother's Day dinner. Mandy sees how remorseful Tobias is and starts to feel sorry for him. Haresh assures Rose that he is very much committed to her.

programme.title: Tanglin - EP 750
programme.desc: Felicia is late for the important meeting with the investor and Xue Ling is livid. Firdaus starts to neglect Pam when he gets busy with work at the gym. Shruti realises that Bhaskar's life is happier without Meera, and begins to question what is best for the family.

programme.title: Clean It, Fix It S3 - EP 7
programme.desc: Master builder and household favourite Tommy Walsh is joined by expert pro cleaner Maxine Dwyer and creative carpenter Asher Edwards, as they meet people across the UK who are struggling with household chaos, grime and clutter. Much more than a makeover show, our dynamic professionals provide real-life, practical solutions, invaluable tips and insider tricks to give viewers brilliant take-away ideas for bettering their own living spaces.

programme.title: The Chefs' Line S2 - EP 42
programme.desc: Every top restaurant has a line of chefs leading to the top, from the Commis chef to the Head chef. This celebratory cooking competition pitches at-home cooking enthusiasts against professionals, starting at the bottom and working their way up. Can they beat their way to the top of The Chef's Line?

programme.title: America's Got Talent S17 - EP 3
programme.desc: With an astronomical number of loyal fans eager to find out what's in store, judges Simon Cowell, Howie Mandel, Heid Klum and Sofia Vergara - and host Terry Crews - are back with more diverse talent and show-stopping moments than ever before.

programme.title: Rumble
programme.desc: In a world where monster wrestling is a global sport and monsters are superstar athletes, teenage Winnie seeks to follow in her father's footsteps by coaching a loveable underdog monster into a champion.

programme.title: News Tonight - EP 51
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: Makan Kakis: Heritage Food Edition - EP 6
programme.desc: Chef Melvyn Lee introduces Denise to two Peranakan family businesses that have been around since the 1940s. Plus, Denise tries her hand at preparing Nonya Laksa and wrapping Nonya Kueh Chang (rice dumplings).

programme.title: Fighting With My Family
programme.desc: A former wrestler and his family make a living performing at small venues around the country while his kids dream of joining World Wrestling Entertainment.

programme.title: Mr. Church
programme.desc: "Mr. Church" tells the story of a unique friendship that develops when a little girl and her dying mother retain the services of a talented cook - Henry Joseph Church. What begins as a six month arrangement instead spans into fifteen years and creates a family bond that lasts forever.

programme.desc: Alex, a young Franco-Chinese man, learns of his brother’s mysterious death, and returns to his family in the Chinese district of Paris. With the help of his cousin Lily, he investigates his brother’s death and uncovers a family secret.

programme.title: A Summer in Iceland
programme.desc: Young Jette flies to Iceland to settle her aunt Rosalie’s ashes in its final resting place. Armed only with Rosalie’s diary, she learns about her aunt’s hidden life of love and survival. Unbeknownst to Jette, her own love story is about to begin too!

programme.title: Commitment Asli
programme.desc: Asli is a young mother struggling to reconcile her commitments as a mother and wife with her professional career. She hires Gulnihal, a nanny and a fellow mother, but whose arrival forces Asli to confront the secrets she has been avoiding.

programme.title: Mission Dadu
programme.desc: The film is about Chumki, an 11 year old girl who feels that the ultimate way of making her war-veteran grandfather happy is by creating a war.

programme.title: Toubab
programme.desc: Soon after being released from prison, Babtou gets in trouble with the law again. Facing deportation to his foreign birthplace he’s never been to, he and his friend Dennis are willing to do anything to stay in the only home they've ever known: Frankfurt.

programme.title: Welcome At Esposito's
programme.desc: Tonino Esposito is the worst mafia boss that ever walked the earth, but when he finds out that his daughter is dating the son of a public attorney, he finally gets the chance to prove his worth to the family and the whole city of Naples.

programme.title: Rival
programme.desc: 9-year-old Roman follows his mother Oksana, an illegal nurse in Germany. Oksana falls in love with 62-year-old Gert who tries to befriend Roman. While spending an afternoon alone with Roman, Gert suddenly dies of a heart attack, leaving Roman alone.

programme.title: Murder in Haute Provence
programme.desc: Two police officers investigate a body found in a slaughterhouse with the label “Can they suffer”. Although an animal rights association was initially suspected, details reveal that the victim was an undercover cop specialising in veterinary surveillance.

programme.title: Otar's Death
programme.desc: Keti and her son Nika find themselves in huge trouble when he hits an old man with his car. With the victim’s family threatening to press charges, Keti must find a way to raise a huge sum of money or Nika might go to prison.

programme.title: Keep Going
programme.desc: Sybille is a divorced mother seeking to reconnect with her violent drifting son, Samuel. As a last resort, she takes him on a horse trip across Kyrgyzstan, facing its magnificent yet hostile natural environment, its people… and above all each other.

programme.title: My Little Sister
programme.desc: Set in Russia during WWII, little Yamil impatiently awaits the day that his father, whom he has never seen, can return home from battle. One day, mother brings home a traumatized orphan girl Oksana. Yamil finds comfort and hope in loving her as a sister.

programme.title: The Etruscan Smile
programme.desc: Neil is a rugged and hostile Scotsman who enjoys solitary life. When he’s forced to seek medical treatment in America, he begrudgingly moves in with his son who tries to connect with him. Yet, it is his grandson who ultimately stirs his hardened heart.

programme.title: Nina
programme.desc: Nina is twelve and her world is falling apart: her parents' marriage has broken down and they are getting a divorce. She takes refuge in competitive swimming but when she is unable to attend a competition, she makes a radical move.

programme.title: Thirst
programme.desc: On a hilltop in Bulgaria plagued by drought, a couple and their teenage son eke out a living doing laundry for local hotels. The arrival of a well-digger and his daughter promises not only to quench their thirst for water, but for something far stronger.

programme.title: Train Driver's Diary
programme.desc: As Ilija nears retirement, his record of unintentional deaths as a train driver weighs heavy. His adopted son, Sima, fears following in his footsteps. But as days pass without incident, Ilija's determination to ensure Sima's success takes a dark turn.

programme.title: Murder in Haute Provence
programme.desc: Two police officers investigate a body found in a slaughterhouse with the label “Can they suffer”. Although an animal rights association was initially suspected, details reveal that the victim was an undercover cop specialising in veterinary surveillance.

programme.title: Melissa
programme.desc: A thriller film about a domestically abused 9-year-old girl, Melissa, forming a bond with her captor after being kidnapped.

programme.title: Commitment Asli
programme.desc: Asli is a young mother struggling to reconcile her commitments as a mother and wife with her professional career. She hires Gulnihal, a nanny and a fellow mother, but whose arrival forces Asli to confront the secrets she has been avoiding.

programme.title: Standing up for Sunny
programme.desc: When Travis, a self-isolated recluse with low-grade cerebral palsy and anger management issues falls for Sunny, an unassuming comedian, he must take the stage to show his true self and win her love.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: After the death of their father and mother, four siblings reunite to come to terms with the tragedy. They decide to participate in a hunting challenge which will determine their inheritance.

programme.title: Murder Party
programme.desc: Jeanne, a brilliant architect, is appointed to restore the sumptuous Daguerre mansion owned by an eccentric family. When the patriarch is found dead during a murder party, Jeanne finds herself caught up in a real-life investigation to unmask the killer.

programme.title: The Inland Road
programme.desc: After surviving a car crash when running away from home, Tia finds herself having nowhere to go. Seeking out the family of the crash victim, she moves in with them and threatens to upend the family’s delicate balance.

programme.title: Launderama
programme.desc: Desiree is a quirky young woman who works a menial job at her mother’s laundromat. When she becomes obsessed with a customer’s jacket, she embarks on a quixotic scheme to have it for herself. She soon discovers that she’s not the only one with secrets.

programme.title: Keep Going
programme.desc: Sybille is a divorced mother seeking to reconnect with her violent drifting son, Samuel. As a last resort, she takes him on a horse trip across Kyrgyzstan, facing its magnificent yet hostile natural environment, its people… and above all each other.

programme.title: Seal Dog
programme.desc: On the surface, they appear to be ordinary dogs, but these canines have a secret identity. They are the Pentagon's stealth warriors, with specialties in explosives detection, tracking, laser target acquisition and bite work. Meet the U.S. Navy SEALs' latest recruits, four-footed soldiers called to duty to save soldiers' lives. SEAL Dog is an intimate look at one of these astonishing animals, Chopper, his partner, American war hero Trevor Maroshek, and the unbreakable bond they formed, on and off the battlefield.

programme.title: The Last Buffalo
programme.desc: The remarkable story of the near extinction and rescue of the American Bison through the eyes of William T Hornaday.

programme.title: A-Bombs Over Nevada
programme.desc: Contemporary footage is used to capture the extraordinary period in the 1950s and 60s when hundreds of atomic bombs were dropped over the Nevada Test Site. The race to create bigger and better bombs led scientists to push the limits and turned a sleepy desert town into a theater of the absurd.

programme.title: Remembering Vietnam: The Wall At 25
programme.desc: Recall the creation and controversy regarding the Vietnam War Memorial in Washington DC.

programme.title: Atlantic: A Year In The Wild - Winter
programme.desc: Exploring the wilderness and wildlife of the Atlantic Ocean. Winter brings bitter storms, suffering and conflict, while most are battling to survive.

programme.title: Atlantic: A Year In The Wild - Spring
programme.desc: As winter draws to a close, the Atlantic springs back to life. Fish that spent the winter out in the deeper water have returned. An eagle pair has set up home high above the perfect fishing spot.

programme.title: Atlantic: A Year In The Wild - Summer
programme.desc: Summer means food is plentiful and this year's youngsters must feed, grow and prepare to start life alone. For puffins it's a massive leap of faith as they jump from their cliff-top nests into the ocean.

programme.title: Atlantic: A Year In The Wild - Autumn
programme.desc: In the Atlantic's far north, autumn is the season of gales, cooling temperatures and driving rain. This is when the wildlife must make the final preparations for winter or migrate to warmer climes.

programme.title: Seal Dog
programme.desc: On the surface, they appear to be ordinary dogs, but these canines have a secret identity. They are the Pentagon's stealth warriors, with specialties in explosives detection, tracking, laser target acquisition and bite work. Meet the U.S. Navy SEALs' latest recruits, four-footed soldiers called to duty to save soldiers' lives. SEAL Dog is an intimate look at one of these astonishing animals, Chopper, his partner, American war hero Trevor Maroshek, and the unbreakable bond they formed, on and off the battlefield.

programme.title: The Last Buffalo
programme.desc: The remarkable story of the near extinction and rescue of the American Bison through the eyes of William T Hornaday.

programme.title: Atlantic: A Year In The Wild - Winter
programme.desc: Exploring the wilderness and wildlife of the Atlantic Ocean. Winter brings bitter storms, suffering and conflict, while most are battling to survive.

programme.title: Atlantic: A Year In The Wild - Spring
programme.desc: As winter draws to a close, the Atlantic springs back to life. Fish that spent the winter out in the deeper water have returned. An eagle pair has set up home high above the perfect fishing spot.

programme.title: Atlantic: A Year In The Wild - Summer
programme.desc: Summer means food is plentiful and this year's youngsters must feed, grow and prepare to start life alone. For puffins it's a massive leap of faith as they jump from their cliff-top nests into the ocean.

programme.title: Atlantic: A Year In The Wild - Autumn
programme.desc: In the Atlantic's far north, autumn is the season of gales, cooling temperatures and driving rain. This is when the wildlife must make the final preparations for winter or migrate to warmer climes.

programme.title: Seal Dog
programme.desc: On the surface, they appear to be ordinary dogs, but these canines have a secret identity. They are the Pentagon's stealth warriors, with specialties in explosives detection, tracking, laser target acquisition and bite work. SEAL Dog is an intimate look at one of these astonishing animals, Chopper, his partner, American war hero Trevor Maroshek, and the unbreakable bond they formed, on and off the battlefield.

programme.title: The Last Buffalo
programme.desc: The remarkable story of the near extinction and rescue of the American Bison through the eyes of William T Hornaday.

programme.title: Remembering Vietnam: The Wall At 25
programme.desc: Recall the creation and controversy regarding the Vietnam War Memorial in Washington DC.

programme.title: Aerial America - California
programme.desc: Buckle up for a spectacular flight along the famous Pacific Coast Highway and over iconic landmarks such as Hearst Castle and the Golden Gate Bridge. Soar above beaches and wine country, across Big Sur redwoods, and into the heart of California.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Myth & Reality
programme.desc: Dogs in New Zealand can detect human emotions? A pet miniature Schnauzer can predict someone's death? How do dogs really communicate with each other?

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Crucial Hearing
programme.desc: A Jack Russell Terrier barks when he ears the unique sound of a life threatening occurrence. How are dogs trained to provide assistance? Amos, trained by Hearing Dogs for Deaf People UK helps his owner through some difficult times.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Above And Beyond Loyal
programme.desc: Amy Rouse and her Border Collie Mist trains for the English National Sheepdog Trials. Quebec's MIRA foundation provides assistance dogs for children with autism. Buddy, a hero dog, guides an Alaskan State Trooper to his owner's workshop.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - The Mystery Of Healing Part 2
programme.desc: Dogs and diabetes - how does it work? Whizz provides therapeutic benefits to children with special needs. Pups in Prison are trained by inmates over a period of 16 months.

programme.title: Into The Puma Triangle
programme.desc: Casey Anderson, a Montana native wildlife expert works with wildlife filmmaker René Araneda to capture the wild pumas of Torres del Paine National Park in Chilean Patagonia. Together, they have filmed things seen nowhere else in the world that will unlock the mystery of the puma’s true nature.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour - Seeing In Colour
programme.desc: Millions of years ago, the first animals had eyes that were unable to distinguish color -- yet as that changed, ‘seeing in color’ gave animals many advantages, whether to find food, attract a mate or warn off an enemy.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour - Hiding In Colour
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals some of the natural world’s most cunning tricksters and masters of disguise. Discover how some animals use color to hide and disappear into the background, or to trick and deceive.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour - Chasing Colour
programme.desc: Find out the stories behind the scientific research on animal colors - from robotic frogs wrestling with real-life counterparts, to spiders wearing eyeliner to attract mates.

programme.title: Aerial America - Hawaii
programme.desc: Join a non-stop journey over America’s most exotic and breathtaking state. Explore lush green cliffs, black-sand beaches, ancient ruins, and vibrant city life. From Molokai to Maui, discover the astonishing stories of Hawaii's eight major islands.

programme.title: Reframed: Marilyn Monroe - Contender
programme.desc: This episode explores the young Norma Jeane. While showing talent and audacity, she turned her back on her difficult childhood and put herself on the radar in Hollywood as ‘Marilyn Monroe’.

programme.title: Reframed: Marilyn Monroe - Siren
programme.desc: This episode explores Marilyn’s defiance about posing nude and how it catapults her to stardom.

programme.title: Reframed: Marilyn Monroe - Rebel
programme.desc: This episode explores Marilyn’s determination to become a serious actress and her departure from Twentieth Century Fox to start her own production company.

programme.title: Reframed: Marilyn Monroe - Icon
programme.desc: This episode explores how Marilyn shows her mature talent as an actress and wins a triumphant victory over Twentieth Century Fox shortly before her untimely death.

programme.title: Titans Of Tech - Elon Musk: Superhero Or Supervillain?
programme.desc: Each one-hour documentary utilises rare archive footage and asks fundamental and serious questions about the personalities’ public facade and their businesses.

programme.title: Aerial America - Amazing Destinations
programme.desc: From its Great Lakes to its Grand Canyon, its Rocky Mountain peaks to its Key West reefs, America is a land of amazing destinations. This adventure over the nation's most remarkable landscapes and landmarks captures her breathtaking beauty.

programme.title: Adolf Island
programme.desc: See the secret remains of a Nazi concentration camp built on British soil. Follow a world-renowned forensic investigator to Alderney, in the Channel Islands, where she races to uncover evidence before the local government can shut her search down.

programme.title: Aliens Inside US
programme.desc: Every one of us teems with trillions of microorganisms. Some of these microbes are what we call "germs," but many more of them are actually good for us. Discover the health benefits of having aliens inside us, and see how those benefits are being threatened by our modern, sterile lifestyles.

programme.title: Eco Eye - Green With Health
programme.desc: Lara looks at the effects of nature on our well-being, both mentally and physically, before uncovering some interesting connections between the effects of nature and green space on society itself.

programme.title: Eco Eye - State Of Nature
programme.desc: Ireland’s favourite bird and its haunting call are on the brink of extinction. Anja travels across the country to find out what’s caused this collapse and if anything can be done to save it.

programme.title: Edge Of Existence - Biosphere
programme.desc: Edge of Existence examines existential threats to the worlds biosphere and what it means for the future of the planet, and Aotearoa.

programme.title: Edge Of Existence - Bio-Threats
programme.desc: Edge of Existence explores a future where bio-threats present one of the greatest existential risks that humanity has ever faced. From viruses to man-made pandemics and synthetic bio-weapons, technology is accelerating the risks of man-made threats.

programme.title: Edge Of Existence - Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: Edge of Existence explores a near-future where artificial intelligence rules the planet, and us. AI will arrive in our life-times bringing with it the biggest existential risk humanity has ever faced.

programme.title: Aerial America - Amazing Destinations
programme.desc: From its Great Lakes to its Grand Canyon, its Rocky Mountain peaks to its Key West reefs, America is a land of amazing destinations. This adventure over the nation's most remarkable landscapes and landmarks captures her breathtaking beauty.

programme.title: Aerial America - Beyond Hollywood
programme.desc: From high in the sky, get a tour of places in the U.S. made famous by Hollywood movies, from superhero hangouts to mobster hideaways.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP15
programme.desc: Starting in Tampa, at Ulele, a rustic chic restaurant with native Floridian fare, is named after a Native American princess. We then head to Orlando where we experience a mouth watering meal at a plant-based deli cafe, Market On South.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP16
programme.desc: We visit Seattle to try a seafood restaurant with an amazing view of the city, then head to Portland to try some genuine Russian food, with a Portland legend. Then back to Seattle to sample some world cuisine.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP17
programme.desc: Kicking off in beautiful Detroit, we meet a local foodie and try some hipster fare. Then off to Cleveland Ohio where we sink our teeth into some amazing barbecue.Then we’ll sample the best chicken and waffles Cleveland has to offer.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP18
programme.desc: Head into the hot American desert to try Cuban food at the magnificent Scott Resort. Then on to the Vegas strip and taste some mouth watering steak. and we eat some magnificent tortilla’s from the back of a food truck.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S2 - Whanganui
programme.desc: Ben is in Whanganui where he goes hunting with All Black legend Glenn Osborne before visiting Woodhaven Gardens.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S2 - Southland
programme.desc: This week, Ben is in Southland where he visits Granity Downs then tries to perfect the art of making Cheese Rolls.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S2 - Auckland
programme.desc: Back in Auckland, Ben fishes for Flounder on the Manukau, learns more about goats and checks out a mushroom farm.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S2 - Northland
programme.desc: Ben continues the final leg of this journey discovering the wonders of the far north.

programme.title: Taste Of The Territory - Fresh Produce
programme.desc: Jimmy heads to the bustling Rapid Creek markets, mingling amongst the food stalls, produce growers, and locals out for their weekly shop.

programme.title: Taste Of The Territory - Flavour
programme.desc: Jimmy meets some of the Greek community preparing food for the Greek cultural festival; he visits the colourful Malak Night Market.

programme.title: Taste Of The Territory - Seafood
programme.desc: Jimmy explains why the Top End has some of the country's best and freshest seafood; Jimmy meets self-taught chef Rachael Ciesolka at a Darwin wharf, and learns how to cook her signature lemon citrus mud crab dish.

programme.title: Taste Of The Territory - Bush Foods
programme.desc: Jimmy travels to the remote Arnhem Land coastal community of Maningrida to get a taste of food out in the bush.

programme.title: Aerial America - Amazing Destinations
programme.desc: From its Great Lakes to its Grand Canyon, its Rocky Mountain peaks to its Key West reefs, America is a land of amazing destinations. This adventure over the nation's most remarkable landscapes and landmarks captures her breathtaking beauty.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Myth & Reality
programme.desc: Dogs in New Zealand can detect human emotions? A pet miniature Schnauzer can predict someone's death? How do dogs really communicate with each other?

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Crucial Hearing
programme.desc: A Jack Russell Terrier barks when he ears the unique sound of a life threatening occurrence. How are dogs trained to provide assistance? Amos, trained by Hearing Dogs for Deaf People UK helps his owner through some difficult times.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Above And Beyond Loyal
programme.desc: Amy Rouse and her Border Collie Mist trains for the English National Sheepdog Trials. Quebec's MIRA foundation provides assistance dogs for children with autism. Buddy, a hero dog, guides an Alaskan State Trooper to his owner's workshop.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - The Mystery Of Healing Part 2
programme.desc: Dogs and diabetes - how does it work? Whizz provides therapeutic benefits to children with special needs. Pups in Prison are trained by inmates over a period of 16 months.

programme.title: Into The Puma Triangle
programme.desc: Casey Anderson, a Montana native wildlife expert works with wildlife filmmaker René Araneda to capture the wild pumas of Torres del Paine National Park in Chilean Patagonia. Together, they have filmed things seen nowhere else in the world that will unlock the mystery of the puma’s true nature.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour - Seeing In Colour
programme.desc: Millions of years ago, the first animals had eyes that were unable to distinguish color -- yet as that changed, ‘seeing in color’ gave animals many advantages, whether to find food, attract a mate or warn off an enemy.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour - Hiding In Colour
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals some of the natural world’s most cunning tricksters and masters of disguise. Discover how some animals use color to hide and disappear into the background, or to trick and deceive.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour - Chasing Colour
programme.desc: Find out the stories behind the scientific research on animal colors - from robotic frogs wrestling with real-life counterparts, to spiders wearing eyeliner to attract mates.

programme.title: Atlantic: A Year In The Wild - Winter
programme.desc: Exploring the wilderness and wildlife of the Atlantic Ocean. Winter brings bitter storms, suffering and conflict, while most are battling to survive.

programme.title: Atlantic: A Year In The Wild - Spring
programme.desc: As winter draws to a close, the Atlantic springs back to life. Fish that spent the winter out in the deeper water have returned. An eagle pair has set up home high above the perfect fishing spot.

programme.title: Atlantic: A Year In The Wild - Summer
programme.desc: Summer means food is plentiful and this year's youngsters must feed, grow and prepare to start life alone. For puffins it's a massive leap of faith as they jump from their cliff-top nests into the ocean.

programme.title: Atlantic: A Year In The Wild - Autumn
programme.desc: In the Atlantic's far north, autumn is the season of gales, cooling temperatures and driving rain. This is when the wildlife must make the final preparations for winter or migrate to warmer climes.

programme.title: Seal Dog
programme.desc: On the surface, they appear to be ordinary dogs, but these canines have a secret identity. They are the Pentagon's stealth warriors, with specialties in explosives detection, tracking, laser target acquisition and bite work. Meet the U.S. Navy SEALs' latest recruits, four-footed soldiers called to duty to save soldiers' lives. SEAL Dog is an intimate look at one of these astonishing animals, Chopper, his partner, American war hero Trevor Maroshek, and the unbreakable bond they formed, on and off the battlefield.

programme.title: The Last Buffalo
programme.desc: The remarkable story of the near extinction and rescue of the American Bison through the eyes of William T Hornaday.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP15
programme.desc: Starting in Tampa, at Ulele, a rustic chic restaurant with native Floridian fare, is named after a Native American princess. We then head to Orlando where we experience a mouth watering meal at a plant-based deli cafe, Market On South.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP16
programme.desc: We visit Seattle to try a seafood restaurant with an amazing view of the city, then head to Portland to try some genuine Russian food, with a Portland legend. Then back to Seattle to sample some world cuisine.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP17
programme.desc: Kicking off in beautiful Detroit, we meet a local foodie and try some hipster fare. Then off to Cleveland Ohio where we sink our teeth into some amazing barbecue.Then we’ll sample the best chicken and waffles Cleveland has to offer.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP18
programme.desc: Head into the hot American desert to try Cuban food at the magnificent Scott Resort. Then on to the Vegas strip and taste some mouth watering steak. and we eat some magnificent tortilla’s from the back of a food truck.

programme.title: Taste Of The Territory - Bush Foods
programme.desc: Jimmy travels to the remote Arnhem Land coastal community of Maningrida to get a taste of food out in the bush.

programme.title: A-Bombs Over Nevada
programme.desc: Contemporary footage is used to capture the extraordinary period in the 1950s and 60s when hundreds of atomic bombs were dropped over the Nevada Test Site. The race to create bigger and better bombs led scientists to push the limits and turned a sleepy desert town into a theater of the absurd.

programme.title: Remembering Vietnam: The Wall At 25
programme.desc: Recall the creation and controversy regarding the Vietnam War Memorial in Washington DC.

programme.title: Aerial America - California
programme.desc: Buckle up for a spectacular flight along the famous Pacific Coast Highway and over iconic landmarks such as Hearst Castle and the Golden Gate Bridge. Soar above beaches and wine country, across Big Sur redwoods, and into the heart of California.

programme.title: Aerial America - Hawaii
programme.desc: Join a non-stop journey over America’s most exotic and breathtaking state. Explore lush green cliffs, black-sand beaches, ancient ruins, and vibrant city life. From Molokai to Maui, discover the astonishing stories of Hawaii's eight major islands.

programme.title: Aerial America - Hawaii
programme.desc: Join a non-stop journey over America’s most exotic and breathtaking state. Explore lush green cliffs, black-sand beaches, ancient ruins, and vibrant city life. From Molokai to Maui, discover the astonishing stories of Hawaii's eight major islands.

programme.title: Aerial America - Amazing Destinations
programme.desc: From its Great Lakes to its Grand Canyon, its Rocky Mountain peaks to its Key West reefs, America is a land of amazing destinations. This adventure over the nation's most remarkable landscapes and landmarks captures her breathtaking beauty.

programme.title: Adolf Island
programme.desc: See the secret remains of a Nazi concentration camp built on British soil. Follow a world-renowned forensic investigator to Alderney, in the Channel Islands, where she races to uncover evidence before the local government can shut her search down.

programme.title: Aliens Inside US
programme.desc: Every one of us teems with trillions of microorganisms. Some of these microbes are what we call "germs," but many more of them are actually good for us. Discover the health benefits of having aliens inside us, and see how those benefits are being threatened by our modern, sterile lifestyles.

programme.title: Eco Eye - Green With Health
programme.desc: Lara looks at the effects of nature on our well-being, both mentally and physically, before uncovering some interesting connections between the effects of nature and green space on society itself.

programme.title: Eco Eye - State Of Nature
programme.desc: Ireland’s favourite bird and its haunting call are on the brink of extinction. Anja travels across the country to find out what’s caused this collapse and if anything can be done to save it.

programme.title: Edge Of Existence - Biosphere
programme.desc: Edge of Existence examines existential threats to the worlds biosphere and what it means for the future of the planet, and Aotearoa.

programme.title: Edge Of Existence - Bio-Threats
programme.desc: Edge of Existence explores a future where bio-threats present one of the greatest existential risks that humanity has ever faced. From viruses to man-made pandemics and synthetic bio-weapons, technology is accelerating the risks of man-made threats.

programme.title: Edge Of Existence - Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: Edge of Existence explores a near-future where artificial intelligence rules the planet, and us. AI will arrive in our life-times bringing with it the biggest existential risk humanity has ever faced.

programme.title: Aerial America - Puerto Rico & The US Virgin Islands
programme.desc: Explore the rich history and stunning natural beauty of Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands from the sky. Surrounded by the sapphire blue sea, these two American territories offer surprises at every turn.

programme.title: Wild Heroes - Orangutan Baby Birth
programme.desc: Auckland Zoo’s primate team prepare to welcome a new birth.

programme.title: Wild Heroes - Two Hooks Turtle
programme.desc: Auckland Zoo’s vet team commences critical care to save the life of an endangered sea turtle snared on a fishing line, and after 3 years without tigers at the Zoo, the team stand by to welcome a new big cat.

programme.title: Wild Heroes - Kiwi Egg Harvest
programme.desc: We follow Auckland Zoo’s bird team into the wilds of the Coromandel Ranges as they help to save native kiwi populations, It’s a feeding frenzy for the Tasmanian devils and the elephant team faces their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Wild Heroes - Feed The Zoo
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, there's shocking news for the elephant team, the vets are concerned about one of their rescued Little penguins, and we find out how it really does take a community to feed the Zoo.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild - Autumn
programme.desc: With days growing shorter and colder, Canadian wildlife is in a race against time, and any animal that fails to make the most of what autumn has to offer will perish.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild - Winter
programme.desc: Winter in Canada is both cruel and beautiful; in the grip of snow and ice, and animals are struggling; however, while some animals hunker down, others have babies to raise who need to adjust to their environment swiftly.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild - Spring
programme.desc: Spring is late this year, and when it finally arrives, the race is on to find a mate and start a family; black bears and beavers in the west, wood frogs in the south and 20,000 gannets in the east all have one thing on their minds.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild - Summer
programme.desc: Summer is the season of plenty for most animals, but not polar bears; unable to hunt seals until the sea freezes over again, they grow hungrier by the day; for other animals summer is when youngsters must learn how to survive.

programme.title: The Town
programme.desc: A bank robber must navigate a dangerous series of complications to get out of the game.

programme.title: Hollywood On Set 1067 - EP1067
programme.desc: Each week Hollywood On Set goes behind-the-scenes on three major movies in production, featuring action footage and interviews with filmmakers.

programme.title: The Theory Of Everything
programme.desc: The story of one of the world’s greatest living minds, Stephen Hawking, and the arts student he fell in love with whilst studying at Cambridge.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Dom Cobb is a skilled thief, the very best at the dangerous art of extraction, stealing valuable secrets from deep within the subconscious mind.

programme.title: Interstellar
programme.desc: An interspace exploratory team overcomes the odds in its heroic interstellar voyage to the very edge of the universe.

programme.title: Game Night
programme.desc: Max and Annie's weekly Game Night gets kicked up a notch when Max's brother arranges a murder mystery.

programme.title: Dolphin Tale
programme.desc: A young boy convinces a doctor to create an attachment for his new dolphin friend to swim better.

programme.title: Shooting Stars
programme.desc: The inspirational story of how LeBron James and his childhood friends became the #1 high school team in the country.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 29: A Duck In The Aquarium - EP29
programme.desc: When Bugs and Squeaks discover that Dr. Clovenhoof has built a time machine, the three go on a journey through time at different ages. Beware those awkward teenage years!

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 30: The Breezehammer - EP30
programme.desc: Astronaut Porky is assigned to place a transmitter on Mars, but gets more than he bargains for when Daffy tags along.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 31: Quantum Sheep - EP31
programme.desc: Bugs and Squeaks are hauling a piano in a cross-country road trip when they are sidetracked by corrupt sheriff Yosemite Sam.

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S2 30: Bam! - EP30
programme.desc: Fish are delish. Unless they are talking to you...

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S2 32: Just One Kiss - EP32

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 33: Ben Again And Again - EP33
programme.desc: Billy Billions' efforts to carve his face onto Mount Rushmore with a laser are upset by Ben. The billionaire brat plots to remove Ben from the Omnitrix, accidentally opening a rift in space-time.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 34: All Koiled Up - EP34
programme.desc: When Ben grows impatient with the snail-like pace of gardening, he goes O-E Overflow to pick up the speed and accidentally floods the community garden.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 35: Dreamtime - EP35
programme.desc: After a series of recurring nightmares affect his sleep, Ben refuses to open up to Max and Gwen about what's bothering him. Before long, they realise Zombozo is behind it.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 36: Innervasion Part 1: Message In A Boxcar - EP36
programme.desc: As Team Tennyson prepares their boxcar for an upcoming race, Ben starts hearing voices and is unable to go Upgrade to enhance his car. Soon after, a mysterious Warbot interrupts the race.

programme.title: Letters To Juliet

programme.desc: Two bickering single parents are stuck with each other when their families are forced to share a suite for a week at a resort.

programme.desc: After winning a lemonade-drinking contest, Lazlo can't find a place to pee!

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 23: Easter Bunny Imposter - EP23
programme.desc: Unable to relax in his messy home, Porky orders a hot tub from Daffy Duck. When Daffy himself shows up to install it, he takes Porky's home from cluttered mess to total pig sty.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 24: Easter Tweets - EP24
programme.desc: While delivering pizzas for Squeaks' new business, Bugs is lured into the home of Miss Cougar by the promise of pampering and relaxation. But Miss Cougar is more interested in eating Bugs than pizza.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 25: Hoarder Up - EP25
programme.desc: Daffy crashes a swanky wedding, and it falls to Leslie P. Lillylegs to get rid of the disastrous duck.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 26: Cougar, Cougar - EP26
programme.desc: Ivana hosts a cooking show and unknowingly involves Bugs when she steals his carrots. Bugs sabotages the live show, proving that revenge is a dish best served cold.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 27: The Wedding Quacksher - EP27
programme.desc: Daffy infiltrates the aquarium to get free food, and it's up to aquarium worker Porky to get him out.

programme.title: Minions
programme.desc: Follow the minion trio as they venture out into the world to find a new evil boss for their brethren to follow.

programme.title: Minions: The Rise Of Gru
programme.desc: In the heart of the 1970s, Gru is growing up in the suburbs. A fanboy of a supervillain supergroup known as the Vicious 6, Gru hatches a plan to become evil enough to join them.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S3 26: Where's Lazlo? - EP26
programme.desc: When Lazlo goes missing from Camp Kidney, a nostalgic Raj and Clam recall life at camp before and after Lazlo arrived.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 01: Valentine's Day - EP1
programme.desc: A Valentine's Card written by Patsy causes havoc throughout Camp Kidney and makes someone very mad -- Patsy's Dad!

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 02: A Job Well Dung - EP2
programme.desc: The Dungs have to earn their keep if they want to stay at Camp Kidney. Too bad they're not good at anything.

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S2 35: What's Eatin' Ya, Cap'm? - EP35
programme.desc: An embarrassing problem for K'Nuckles becomes a problem for everyone else. Thanks K'Nuckles!

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S2 36: I'm So Proud Of Me - EP36
programme.desc: Flapjack gets his picture on the front page of the Stormalong Sentinel, and K'Nuckles couldn't be prouder. Until he sees the picture.

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S2 37: A Day Without Laughter - EP37
programme.desc: Flapjack strives to make Stormalong's most underappreciated comedian feel appreciated...

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S3 01: All Hands On Deck - EP1
programme.desc: Meet Flapjack, a young boy who dreams of being a sea adventurer.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 37: Innervasion Part 2: Call The Dream Police - EP37
programme.desc: After beating the Warbot and finding Vilgax inside, Ben's "secret voices" worsen and begin to affect his sleep. Gwen discovers Ben sleepwalking and using campsite items to create his own Junkbot.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 38: Innervasion Part 3: Strange Bedfellows - EP38
programme.desc: After the Junkbot shoots the Omnitrix and it begins glowing neon-blue, an imprisoned Vilgax explains it is now a gateway through which the Fulmini Empire will invade Earth.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 39: Innervasion Part 4: Mind Over Alien Matter - EP39
programme.desc: While inside the Omnitrix, Ben and Vilgax must work together if they are to close the gateway, but once the Fulmini leader, the High Override, appears, even that might not be enough.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 40: Innervasion Part 5: High Override - EP40
programme.desc: While Ben struggles to avoid the High Override's mind control, Max and Gwen enter the Omnitrix to lend a hand. Once they discover Ben is not who he seems, Max and Gwen must go all out to help him.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 01: Forgeti - EP1
programme.desc: When Gwen drags Ben along on a hike in search of the legendary Forgeti - a yeti that makes people forget they ever saw it - Ben is dubious.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 32: Houston, We Have A Duck Problem - EP32
programme.desc: Bugs unintenionally crashes the "World Games," and is forced to go up against an overconfident Calzone. Can Bugs defeat Cal and go for gold?

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 33: 10-4, Good Bunny - EP33
programme.desc: When Leslie P. Lillylegs tries to woo rich widow Granny and steal his money, Bugs decides to foil his plan by giving him terrible romantic advice.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 34: Gold Medal Wabbit - EP34
programme.desc: Spoiled Pampreen Perdy's mansion is up for a neighborhood "Beautification" award. It's up to Porky, her groundskeeper, to keep Daffy Duck from ruining everything.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 35: Cyrano De Bugs - EP35
programme.desc: Sir Littlechin hopes to capture the elusive Kraken, and mistakes Bugs Bunny for the beast. Bugs learns the actual Kraken is a kind-hearted soul, and tries to protect it from Littlechin.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 36: Point Duck Percent - EP36
programme.desc: Zen Master Elmer Fudd sends Porky to escort a sacred pickle to the temple of I-Ate-A-Tomoto. Only one thing stands in his way… Daffy the Ninja.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 37: Sir Littlechin And The Kraken - EP37
programme.desc: Archaelogists Porky and Daffy stumble into the tomb of King Nutininkommen, and have to get out again before the mummy catches up with them.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 38: Crounching Porky, Hidden Daffy - EP38
programme.desc: An angry environmentalist picks the wrong person to stop for a donation when he flags down Foghorn Leghorn.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 39: King Nutininkommen - EP39
programme.desc: Bugs is upset when he sees magician Viktor performing his tricks on a helpless bunny. Bugs agrees to be Viktor's assistant if Viktor lets the bunny go, but Viktor gets more than he bargained for.

programme.desc: Harold tries a little too hard to impress his new best friend, Raj.

programme.desc: Fish are delish. Unless they are talking to you...

programme.desc: K'Nuckles becomes mayor of Stormalong. Sorry, Stormalong!

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S3 04: I'm A Believer - EP4
programme.desc: If there's something strange in your neighborhood, who ya gonna call? Flapjack (because there's no such thing as ghosts).

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S3 05: Liar, Liar You For Hire? - EP5
programme.desc: K'Nuckles has the perfect plan for scamming the tourist crowd in Stormalong...

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S3 06: Candy Colleague - EP6
programme.desc: All Doctor Barber wants is a friendly, professional conversation with a man made out of candy. Is that too much to ask for?

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 02: The Filth - EP2
programme.desc: Ben is tasked with cleaning the Rust Bucket but is soon tricked into letting the villainous and vile Fly Guys steal it.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 03: Clown College - EP3
programme.desc: While tailgating at a State U. homecoming football game, Ben teams up with Grandpa Max's old college buddies to keep the crazy clown Zombozo from robbing the stadium blind at halftime.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 04: The Ring Leader - EP4
programme.desc: While winning big on a Sumo Slammers video game, Ben gets the idea to win a real wrestling match - until an intimidating wrestler named Iron Kyle decides to make it a true challenge.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 05: Take 10 - EP5
programme.desc: While trying to film his own indie film, Ben accidentally lets the Bug Gang go free and when he takes the fight to their hidden lair, Ben has to take on their narcissistic leader - the Ant Queen.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 06: Ben 24hrs - EP6
programme.desc: Ben and Gwen attempt to stay up all night for Adrenaland but Ben fails to utilise his alien powers to stay awake and starts causing disaster after disaster.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 41: Abracawabbit - EP41
programme.desc: When Squeaks spends his life savings on Foghorn's fradulent snake oil, Bugs has no choice but to beat the bird at his own game.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 42: Ponce De Calzone - EP42
programme.desc: Porky and Daffy are on duty delivering babies to expecting parents. When Baby Jack's parents aren't home, the pair try their hand and parenting until the real parents return.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 43: For The Love Of Fraud - EP43
programme.desc: Bugs is in the middle of an epic cartoon adventure when he and the board artist get into an argument. The star and the artist try and re-boot the cartoon, to mixed results.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 44: Not So Special Delivery - EP44
programme.desc: Daffy Duck can't handle his own celebrity when Elmer turns him into a beloved symbol of the summer season.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 45: One Carroter In Search Of An Artist - EP45

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 10: Growing Pains - EP10

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 11: Villain Time - EP11
